CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Rusty Kettle}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VE.Q: What is The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic in 2021?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic in 2021 is {678.25} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic in 2012?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic in 2012 is {565.98} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic in 2014?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic in 2014 is {615.31} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Customer Traffic in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total customer traffic is {714.44} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Customer Traffic in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total customer traffic is {1084.25} customers/day.

SC.Q: What is the average height of The Cozy Nook's Customer Traffic area?
SC.A: The average height of The Cozy Nook's customer traffic area is {272.51} customers/day.

SC.Q: What is the average height of The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic area?
SC.A: The average height of The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic area is {617.77} customers/day.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic go below 803 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {714.44} customers/day in {2021}, total value was {771.77} customers/day in {2015}, total value was {800.60} customers/day in {2018}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic fall between 846 and 935 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {848.66} customers/day in {2012}, total value was {925.25} customers/day in {2017}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic exceed 977 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {1003.94} customers/day in {2009}, total value was {1039.25} customers/day in {2011}, total value was {1084.25} customers/day in {2007}.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2017, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2008 and 2021?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between {2008} and {2017} was {smaller} than between {2008} and {2021}.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2015, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2013 and 2017?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between {2013} and {2015} was {smaller} than between {2013} and {2017}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 2008 higher or lower than in 2013?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in {2008} was {higher} than in {2013}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 2008 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in {2008} was {higher} than in {2017}.
